text: Ana nehu'na ru moparega vahe'ma Isipi mopafima enemaniza vahe'enena zamuge'za ne'naze. Anantetira maka Uzi mopafima nemaniza kini vahe ome zamuge'za ne'naze. Hagi Filistia vahe kinia 4'a kumate'ma mani'nazana, Askelonima, Gazama, Ekronine osi'a naga'ma ofri'ma mani'naza Asdoti naga'mokizimi kini vahe'ene ome zamuge'za ana waini tina ne'naze.
